about_the_game:
You are Sister Charlotte Bronson. Next Generation Combat Cyborg. Master of Ninjutsu. Bride of Christ. Hunting the infamous necromancer Van Owen to Beanas Aries - You sneak aboard a Zeplin headed behind enemy lines. A legion of robo-demonical adversaries await you in a fallen European hellscape.

Armed with your upgradable laser ninjaken, plasma shuriken, and your faith in the Lord, you’ll do battle with the forces of darkness. The damned are all around you! Beware of shambling cyber horrors, vengeful spirits, and unspeakable writhing masses of living death as you travel through the wicked forests, haunted prison camps, and ruined cities of Europe.

A diabolical plot is about to be revealed as an ancient evil casts a sinister shadow. Time is running out. The fate of the world is at stake. But, God has not abandoned the faithful…. He sent you!



Traverse a twisted world where reason and the laws of nature no longer hold!

Wade through the wrath of the dead and the damned and stand against the madness!

Power up your weapons and unleash the full fury of a cybernetic ninja!

Pursued by death itself cut a path to rescue your allies!

Life or death. The fate of the mission depends on your actions!


This is the first game I’ve ever worked on where I did everything on my own. I don’t know if I accomplished what I set out to do. I do know that I did what I was always going to do. I created a game of a particular time and place. Not a game in a style or spirit, but a game that might very well have actually existed long ago even though it did not. Against reason, this game contains several things both good and bad with the aim of performing at least a few miracles. May one of them steal you to that very particular place, whether you’ve been there before or not. Become frustrated and confused, so that you might persevere and be victorious.

-GBG

Contra Mundus

Contra Mundus
name: Cybernetic Ninja Nuns

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Window 7
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 290 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more, ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 290 MB available space

short_description: To accomplish your mission, battle the Robo Demoniac legions and deliver Europe from the clutches of darkness in a race against death itself. An action platformer from another world, brought to you by The Good Bad Guy.
